title: Gerbil Goddess
content:
[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]

[[=]]

+ Gerbil Goddess 

[[/=]]

It's what I do on my time off from the site.

I pick up one of my 5 gerbils; I put a tiny crown on them; I call them King/Queen for the day.

And then I never go outside ever.

[[=image https://imgur.com/cCDbQKH.jpg]]

[[=]]
++++++ //"Gerbil Goddess", marker and ink, May 2023//
[[/=]]

So I guess this is an author self-portrait with very little embellished because I draw as I live and I live as I draw. 

Sometimes, I wear [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:ontheinsidebitch a human face.]

If you want to read my one of my too many Tales, please consider [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/reform-the-universe reforming the universe] with me, where you can find my main-man [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/kit-s-home-hub-of-happening Kit] and a mishmash of other horrors, comforts and devastations.

------

[[=]]

+++++ Do you want to meet [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:kitsuckingtoohardonthatlollipop Kit?]

[[/=]]
author: Zara Calico
